notesStmt.note: CAO sources differ in the number of concluding 'alleluia'. CAO-R and CAO-D both give the text twice, with two different melodies.

aBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L Hyd

ant.aBody:
Surrexit dominus de sepulcro qui pro nobis pependit in ligno
alleluia alleluia alleluia alleluia alleluia alleluia
